Characters:

Soshi Niji (13yrs, 4', 103 Ibs): Shy, loving, smart, has trouble speaking up for himself and is often looked down upon by the other boys

Lucretia Niji (35yrs, 15'6, 9,405Ibs): Soshi's mother and the biggest woman in the entire town/world, loves her son to the point where she drives him to school and is very protective of him, she is his school's principal

Karin Shuzme (18yrs, 12'9, 5,978 Ibs): Soshi's loving possessive girlfriend, she will decimate anyone who threatens her boyfriend, leader of a gang she formed to protect him

Aiko Niji (23 yrs, 13'8, 6,820Ibs): Lucretia's eldest child and Soshi's eldest sister, she loves her baby brother very much and will often make his lunches for him to take to school

Akemi Niji (18yrs, 12'1, 5,900Ibs): Second eldest sister, she too adores her baby brother

Ai Niji (16yrs 11'6, 5,500 Ibs) : Third sister, like her older sisters loves her little brother to death, will often playfully and lovingly tease him

Megumi Niji (9 yrs, 10'5, 5,300lbs): Youngest daughter and Soshi's younger sister, adores her big brother to where she and him now share the very same bedroom
info.pretty_title: Soshi Niji and his Giant SSBBW Girls
